ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] How to embed user specific content in a common page?
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course, there s nothing about my solution that requires XSLT; that s just my solution.  The same architecture may be implemented using XHR in /A to

Of course, there's nothing about my solution that requires XSLT; that's
just "my" solution.  The same architecture may be implemented using XHR
in /A to request JSON personalization data from /C .

-Eric
